description:
The life form time accelerator device exploded and Shimoda and the others are blasted to Galapagos.
To make it worse, the entire team got turned into children!
Being attacked by the animals being tested is just one danger there,
but Shimoda, Saturn, Mars, and one member of the Insect department
use the "insect that can smell an SOS signal" to search for the designers.
Source: crunchyroll
